```{r Import libraries, warning=FALSE}
# importing libraries

library(tsdl)
library(forecast)
library(dygraphs)
library(ggplot2)
```


The dataset is present in the tsdl library of R.

```{r Call Dataset}
d = subset(tsdl, description="Annual water use")

# Details of the dataset
print(attributes(d[[1]])$description)
```
